item.title: crypto
item.description: crypto:hash(md5, Bin||Str). md5_to_str(Str) -> <<Mac:128/integer>> = erlang:md5(Str), lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~32.16.0b", [Mac])). md5(S) -> Md5_bin = erlang:md5(S), Md5_list = binary_to_list(Md5_bin), lists:flatten(list_to_hex(Md5_list)). list_to_hex(L) -> lists:map(fun(X) -> int_to_hex(X) end, L). int_to_hex(N) when N < 256 -> [hex(N div 16), hex(N rem 16)]. hex(N) when N < 10 -> $0 + N; hex(N) when N >= 10, N < 16 -> $a + (N - 10). md5_to_str(Str) -> <<M:128/integer>> = erlang:md5(Str), Integer_to_hex( M, 32 ). integer_to_hex(I,
